titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, April 2, 1946

mods.tableOfContents: Adoption Ceremony: Dr. Cross - inducted into Comanche Tribe and made Honorary Chief by Albert Attocknie. Albert Attocknie. War Dances (3). Little Pony Dance. War Dance. Round Dance (Dr. Cross Dances). Crow Dance (2) Battle Song. Comanche Raid Songs (2). Fast War Dance (3). Slow War Dance (2).
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please use the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
